thread.title: BEVERLY TOMASELLO
thread.title_full: Hodges Badge Company, Inc reviewed by BEVERLY TOMASELLO

author: BEVERLY TOMASELLO
title: BEVERLY TOMASELLO
text: I ordered two ribbons for my husband because one was awarded, but not given to him and the other was to replace one that he received but was lost when we moved. The quality is great and they were actually delivered before the expected date, making them a great Christmas gift. My husband was very pleased with the way they were packed and shipped. Also, the person I spoke with was very pleasant and overall, your customer service is terrific!
